name: LUNA CHAPTER 2
description:
DEMO (Includes all of Chapter 1) : https://alex-star.itch.io/luna

LUNA is the story of a young girl's adventure through two distinct worlds to save them from an impending calamity. This game covers both Chapter 1 and Chapter 2 of the story.

Luna's journey continues in Chapter 2, bringing with it new sights, mysteries, and adversaries. With new dangers ahead of her, Luna will have to team up with some unlikely allies in order to  seek and destroy the bizarre artifacts threatening to bring about the end of both of their worlds.

  • An over world that drastically changes when you flip between worlds.
  • Traditional Bullet-hell boss battles with a challenging yet approachable difficulty.
  • Tons of secrets and hidden treasures to find that boost your power and defense.
  • Unique puzzles that require you to flip between worlds.
  • Interact with rich and complex characters that comprise a mysterious story.
  • A large cast of unique, and stylized bosses, each with their own  mechanics, personality, and music.
  • A great entry level  game into the bullet-hell franchise, with an approachable difficulty curve that makes retrying easy, and enough variety to entice veterans of the genre.
  • A power system that rewards diligence and exploration over equipment and levels.
  • Every room hides secrets - Flipping between worlds is key to uncovering them all!
